title: 2011 World Series
summary: The 2011 World Series was the championship series of Major League Baseball's (MLB) 2011 season.[1] The 107th edition of World Series, it was a best-of-seven playoff played between the American League (AL) champion Texas Rangers and the National League (NL) champion St. Louis Cardinals;[2][3] the Cardinals defeated the Rangers in 7 games to win their 11th World Series championship and their first since 2006.
